meanings.definition: A taxonomic subtribe within the tribe Anacardieae, within the family Anacardiaceae; it contains several genera of flowering plants, including Rhus.
meanings.english_definition: A taxonomic subtribe within the tribe Anacardieae, within the family Anacardiaceae; it contains several genera of flowering plants, including Rhus.

etymology.value: From the genus name Rhus + -es (taxonomic suffix).

readability_explanation.text: This term is highly technical and specific to botany and taxonomy. It is unlikely to be encountered outside of scientific contexts.
